title: The churches securitie, togither with the antidote or preseruative of euer waking faith A treatise conteyning many fruitefull instructions, moralities and consolations fit for the time and age wherein wee liue. Herevnto is annexed a sound and profitable treatise of the generall signes and fore-runners of the last iudgement. By Thomas Drax.
author: Draxe, Thomas, d. 1618.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted by George Eld, and are to be sold by Iohn Wright at his shoppe at Christ-church Gate,
